class_notes:
(Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)
In this class, we will look at the basics of DNA structure, the development of techniques used in modern genetic research, and how DNA is used in forensic analysis.  The class will be discussion-based, with little formal lecture.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1677, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: K. Campbell, Status: Closed
